lines.text: [after the saxophone opening theme ends]
This is the best elevator music I've ever heard!
Cliff, why did we have four children?
Because we did not want five.
Rudy, what are you gonna do in life with a fourth grade education ?
Teach third grade !
You two are the most obnoxious people that I ever met.
Thank you, your grumpiness.

[watching all the news reports about nuclear bombs on TV]
Rudy, hurry up and become president because we need you now!
Please!
Clair, we don't even know if the joint is Theo's and you already got the boy going to Turkey.

[trying to get Rudy to eat her Brussel sprouts]
Okay, pretend you're King Kong and those are the Three Stooges.
No!
If you call a female surgeon 'old', she will tear you apart.
[repeated line]
Look at me when you lie.
Your grandson got his ear pierced.
On purpose?

[to Rudy]
No, no, don't take my bubble thing.

[to Vanessa's 12 year old friend]
When Mrs. Huxtable comes home, you bring the car around.
